import React,{useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Home = props => { const[cart, setCart]=useState([]); const PAGE_PRODUCTS="products"; const PAGE_CART="cart"; const[page, setPage]=useState(PAGE_PRODUCTS); const navigateTo=(nextpage)=>{ setPage(nextpage); } const cong=(id)=>{ cart.forEach(item=>{ if(item.id===id){ item.count++; } }) console.log(item.cout); } const tru=(id)=>{ cart.forEach(item=>{ if(item.id===id){ item.count===1?item.count=1:item.count-=1; } }) } const addToCart=(id)=>{ let newCart=[...cart]; const check=cart.every(ga=>{ return ga.id !==id; }) if(check){ const data=props.products.filter(pr=>{ return pr.id===id; }) setCart([...cart,...data]); props.onAdd(cart); } else( alert("sản phẩm đã có trong giỏ hàng") ) } const reMove=(id)=>{ setCart( cart.filter(pro=>{ return pro.id != id; }) ) } const renderProducts=()=>( <>
{/* product list item start */} {/* product item list end */} { props.products.map(value=>{ return (
{/* product grid item start */}
{value.name}
${value.price} ${value.sale_price}
)})}
